original_text: Because Elkanah loved Hannah very much, he always gave twice as much meat to her. But the Lord had not let Hannah give birth to any children.
korean_text: 한나에게는 갑절을 주니 이는 그를 사랑함이라 그러나 여호와께서 그에게 임신하지 못하게 하시니

sentences.original_text: Because Elkanah loved Hannah very much
he always gave twice as much meat to her
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 언제나 그녀에게 두 배의 고기를 주었다

sentences.original_text: But the Lord had not let Hannah give birth
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주께서는 한나가 아이를 낳게 하지 않으셨고
